Join the Seed & Sell Contract Program

Stop guessing what to grow. Stop worrying about finding buyers. Our Contract Program is designed for farmers who want guaranteed sales and security.

How It Works

  • We do the market research to see what buyers need.
  • We provide you with high-quality seeds for those crops.
  • You grow the produce, following our simple quality guidelines.
  • We buy 100% of your harvest at a pre-agreed price.
  • You get paid. No-hassle, no marketing, just farming.

Why Join Us?

  • Guaranteed Income: Know exactly how much you'll make before you plant.
  • All Inputs Provided: We supply the seeds and (in some cases) fertilizer.
  • No More Wasted Produce: We buy everything you grow under the contract.
  • Focus On Farming: Let us handle the marketing, logistics, and sales.

Ready to grow with us?
If you are one of our rural farmers, our on-the-ground team will visit you. If you are on the app, send us a message to get started!
